service.name: Widow Allowance
service.description: Widow Allowance (WA) was introduced to provide an income support option for older women who had lost the support of a partner (through death, divorce or separation) and who had no recent workforce experience. WA will be phased out from 1 July 2005 with new grants from this date only to be made to women who were born on or before 1 July 1955.
